dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9360 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to certain members of the Armed Forces eligibility to transfer unused Post-9/11 educational assistance to family members.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself, Mr. Courtney, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Ms. Sherrill, Mr. Kim of New Jersey, Mr. Ryan of Ohio, and Mr. Carbajal) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to certain members of the Armed Forces eligibility to transfer unused Post-9/11 educational assistance to family members.

section.header: Extension to certain members of the Armed Forces eligibility to transfer unused Post-9/11 educational assistance to family members
section.text: Section 3319(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking or at the end;
by redesignating paragraph (2) as paragraph (3); and
by inserting before paragraph (3), as redesignated, the following:
12 years of service in the Armed Forces; or
